evidence.text:
TEEN OWEN: Mom?
TEEN OWEN: Can I stay up late tonight to watch The Pink Opaque?
BRENDA: What time's it on?
TEEN OWEN: 30pm.
BRENDA: You know that your bedtime's 10:15.
TEEN OWEN: Yeah but...
TEEN OWEN: No one else in ninth grade even has a bedtime anymore.

BRENDA: Your dad's driving me to my appointment!
TEEN OWEN: Okay!
